item.name: Abbey Gargoyles
item.text: Flying, protection from red
item.flavorText: "Though Serra has not been seen for twenty years, her Gargoyles still watch over our city and punish the guilty." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

item.name: Abbey Matron
item.text: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The Matrons still say Serra is coming back. I bet she never even existed." —Murat, Death Speaker

item.name: Abbey Matron
item.text: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The Matrons still say Serra is coming back. I bet she never even existed." —Murat, Death Speaker

item.name: Æther Storm
item.text: Creature spells can't be cast. Pay 4 life: Destroy Æther Storm. It can't be regenerated. Any player may activate this ability.
item.flavorText: "I do love the rain . . . but this storm feels somehow wrong, Taysir." —Daria

item.name: Aliban's Tower
item.text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Those who hide in hollow towers would do well to remember the rain." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

item.name: Aliban's Tower
item.text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Those who hide in hollow towers would do well to remember the rain." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

item.name: Ambush
item.text: Blocking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Don't these goons have anything better to do?" —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

item.name: Ambush Party
item.text: First strike, haste
item.flavorText: "Call it a cost of doing business. The best way to protect against thieves is to hire better thieves." —Eron the Relentless

item.name: Ambush Party
item.text: First strike, haste
item.flavorText: "Call it a cost of doing business. The best way to protect against thieves is to hire better thieves." —Eron the Relentless

item.name: Anaba Ancestor
item.text: {T}: Another target Minotaur creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The Ancestors are the wisdom of the tribe and the soul of the Homelands. I am eternally in their debt." —Taysir

item.name: Anaba Bodyguard
item.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: "Not someone to pick a fight with, unless you're fond of pain." —Halina, Dwarven Trader

item.name: Anaba Bodyguard
item.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: "Not someone to pick a fight with, unless you're fond of pain." —Halina, Dwarven Trader

item.name: Anaba Shaman
item.text: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "The Shamans? Ha They are mere craven cows not capable of true magic." —Irini Sengir

item.name: Anaba Shaman
item.text: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "The Shamans? Ha They are mere craven cows not capable of true magic." —Irini Sengir

item.name: Anaba Spirit Crafter
item.text: Minotaur creatures get +1/+0.
item.flavorText: "The Spirit Crafters sing of all our people. They sing of those lost, of those found, and of those who are yet to be." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

item.name: An-Havva Constable
item.text: An-Havva Constable's toughness is equal to 1 plus the number of green creatures on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Joskun and the other Constables serve with passion, if not with grace." —Devin, Faerie Noble

item.name: An-Havva Inn
item.text: You gain X plus 1 life, where X is the number of green creatures on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "The Inn was ever a steady source of good cheer and kindness. Greatly do I miss it, now that I am gone." —Ihsan's Shade

item.name: An-Havva Township
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Folk of good heart will always find a home.

item.name: An-Zerrin Ruins
item.text: As An-Zerrin Ruins enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
item.flavorText: "The An-Zerrins have served me well, ever since I first killed them." —Baron Sengir

item.name: Apocalypse Chime
item.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Apocalypse Chime: Destroy all nontoken permanents from the Homelands expansion. They can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "One day, or another, perhaps I shall ring my pretty chime . . . loudly, so that all may hear." —Grandmother Sengir

item.name: Autumn Willow
item.text: Shroud {G}: Until end of turn, Autumn Willow can be the target of spells and abilities controlled by target player as though it didn't have shroud.
item.flavorText: "We must shake her limbs and rattle her brains." —Grandmother Sengir

item.name: Aysen Abbey
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Serra's gift to her people: a symbol of faith and hope.

item.name: Aysen Bureaucrats
item.text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.
item.flavorText: "All the tortures of my vault of horrors pale in comparison to dealing with those petty Bureaucrats." —Baron Sengir

item.name: Aysen Bureaucrats
item.text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.
item.flavorText: "All the tortures of my vault of horrors pale in comparison to dealing with those petty Bureaucrats." —Baron Sengir

item.name: Aysen Crusader
item.text: Aysen Crusader's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Soldiers and Warriors you control.
item.flavorText: "A renegade rallying the rabble does not a true Crusader make." —Irini Sengir

item.name: Aysen Highway
item.text: White creatures have plainswalk.
item.flavorText: "Tread the roads of righteousness, Murat, lest you lose your way and be consumed." —Baris, Serra Inquisitor

item.name: Baki's Curse
item.text: Baki's Curse deals 2 damage to each creature for each Aura attached to that creature.
item.flavorText: "Those who fling spells too quickly should have reason to regret it." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

item.name: Baron Sengir
item.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Baron Sengir this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +2/+2 counter on Baron Sengir. {T}: Regenerate another target Vampire.
item.flavorText: "Beast. Defiler. The source of all my pain."Ihsan's Shade

item.name: Beast Walkers
item.text: {G}: Beast Walkers gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "The Beast Walkers do a great service to Aysen. As humans or as beasts, their heart is yet to Serra true." —Baris, Serra Inquisitor

item.name: Black Carriage
item.text: Trample Black Carriage doesn't untap during your untap step. Sacrifice a creature: Untap Black Carriage. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
item.flavorText: "The Baron's drivers are also driven." —Chandler

item.name: Broken Visage
item.text: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Put a black Spirit creature token with that creature's power and toughness onto the battlefield. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Carapace
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "Now, that's a fashion statement." —Devin, Faerie Noble

item.name: Carapace
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "Now, that's a fashion statement." —Devin, Faerie Noble

item.name: Castle Sengir
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Where hope has no champion, evil rules all.

item.name: Cemetery Gate
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Protection from black
item.flavorText: "Just the place for a picnic." —Murat, Death Speaker

item.name: Cemetery Gate
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Protection from black
item.flavorText: "Just the place for a picnic." —Murat, Death Speaker

item.name: Chain Stasis
item.text: You may tap or untap target creature. Then that creature's controller may pay {2}{U}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.
item.flavorText: "Here we go again." —Kakra, Sea Troll

item.name: Chandler
item.text: {R}{R}{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact creature.
item.flavorText: "Never brag about the latest wonder you've created, students. Chandler might be listening." —Reveka, Wizard Savant

item.name: Clockwork Gnomes
item.text: {3}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact creature.
item.flavorText: "Until I came to the Floating Isle, I never had to oil the servants." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

item.name: Clockwork Steed
item.text: Clockwork Steed enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. Clockwork Steed can't be blocked by artifact creatures. At end of combat, if Clockwork Steed attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

item.name: Clockwork Swarm
item.text: Clockwork Swarm enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. Clockwork Swarm can't be blocked by Walls. At end of combat, if Clockwork Swarm attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

item.name: Coral Reef
item.text: Coral Reef enters the battlefield with four polyp counters on it. Sacrifice an Island: Put two polyp counters on Coral Reef. {U}, Tap an untapped blue creature you control, Remove a polyp counter from Coral Reef: Put a +0/+1 counter on target creature.

item.name: Dark Maze
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {0}: Dark Maze can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: "The path of faith is fortunately fraught with failure." —Irini Sengir

item.name: Dark Maze
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {0}: Dark Maze can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: "The path of faith is fortunately fraught with failure." —Irini Sengir

item.name: Daughter of Autumn
item.text: {W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target white creature this turn is dealt to Daughter of Autumn instead.
item.flavorText: "Those who say that Serra is dead have never met the Autumn Willow's daughters. They are as kind and as generous as Serra would wish us to be." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

item.name: Death Speakers
item.text: Protection from black
item.flavorText: "Such innocent little birds. They sing a sweet song, sitting on their fragile branch." —Grandmother Sengir

item.name: Didgeridoo
item.text: {3}: You may put a Minotaur permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Play the song of he who delivered us. Play the song of Feroz." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

item.name: Drudge Spell
item.text: {B}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Put a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token onto the battlefield. It has "{B}: Regenerate this creature." When Drudge Spell leaves the battlefield, destroy all Skeleton tokens. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Dry Spell
item.text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: "My soul thirsts for Serra's salvation, as does my body for life's breath." —Ihsan's Shade

item.name: Dry Spell
item.text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: "My soul thirsts for Serra's salvation, as does my body for life's breath." —Ihsan's Shade

item.name: Dwarven Pony
item.text: {1}{R}, {T}: Target Dwarf creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I hear Halina's got a pony that can count to six—and likes to eat meat." —Chandler

item.name: Dwarven Sea Clan
item.text: {T}: Choose target attacking or blocking creature whose controller controls an Island. Dwarven Sea Clan deals 2 damage to that creature at end of combat. Activate this ability only before the end of combat step.
item.flavorText: "No dwarf alive can best one of my crew dead." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

item.name: Dwarven Trader
item.flavorText: "They wouldn't sell their own families—at least, not for cheap." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

item.name: Dwarven Trader
item.flavorText: "They wouldn't sell their own families—at least, not for cheap." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

item.name: Ebony Rhino
item.text: Trample
item.flavorText: "That Rhino would fetch us a tidy sum, Joven. Perhaps it's time to make it ours." —Chandler

item.name: Eron the Relentless
item.text: Haste {R}{R}{R}: Regenerate Eron the Relentless.
item.flavorText: "Eron would be much less of a hassle if only he were mortal." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

item.name: Evaporate
item.text: Evaporate deals 1 damage to each creature that's white or blue.
item.flavorText: "The body is a temple with a foundation of sand." —Autumn Willow

item.name: Faerie Noble
item.text: Flying Other Faerie creatures you control get +0/+1. {T}: Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Faeries talk all in riddles and tricky bits, ‘cept the Nobles. Now, there's some straight talkers." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

item.name: Feast of the Unicorn
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+0.
item.flavorText: "Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the Baron knows of one." —Autumn Willow

item.name: Feast of the Unicorn
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+0.
item.flavorText: "Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the Baron knows of one." —Autumn Willow

item.name: Feroz's Ban
item.text: Creature spells cost {2} more to cast.
item.flavorText: "Without the protection of Feroz's Ban, I fear the Homelands are lost." —Daria

item.name: Folk of An-Havva
item.text: Whenever Folk of An-Havva blocks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "This town's only for good folk. The rest can go to the city." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

item.name: Folk of An-Havva
item.text: Whenever Folk of An-Havva blocks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "This town's only for good folk. The rest can go to the city." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

item.name: Forget
item.text: Target player discards two cards, then draws as many cards as he or she discarded this way.

item.name: Funeral March
item.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature.
item.flavorText: "This party is such fun—but it's a shame to mourn just one." —Irini Sengir

item.name: Ghost Hounds
item.text: Vigilance Whenever Ghost Hounds blocks or becomes blocked by a white creature, Ghost Hounds gains first strike until end of turn.

item.name: Giant Albatross
item.text: Flying When Giant Albatross is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, for each creature that dealt damage to Giant Albatross this turn, destroy that creature unless its controller pays 2 life. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

item.name: Giant Albatross
item.text: Flying When Giant Albatross is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, for each creature that dealt damage to Giant Albatross this turn, destroy that creature unless its controller pays 2 life. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

item.name: Giant Oyster
item.text: You may choose not to untap Giant Oyster during your untap step. {T}: For as long as Giant Oyster remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.

item.name: Grandmother Sengir
item.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Rarely have power and madness been so delightfully wed as they have in our dear Grandmother." —Baron Sengir

item.name: Greater Werewolf
item.text: At end of combat, put a -0/-2 counter on all creatures blocking or blocked by Greater Werewolf.
item.flavorText: "The wolf-things are no mere beasts, but the lieutenants of the Baron." —Taysir

item.name: Hazduhr the Abbot
item.text: {X}, {T}: The next X damage that would be dealt this turn to target white creature you control is dealt to Hazduhr the Abbot instead.
item.flavorText: "Soon, Serra will return and choose the Abbot's successor, else we are lost." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

item.name: Headstone
item.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Your headstone is the last page in the book of your life." —Murat, Death Speaker

item.name: Heart Wolf
item.text: First strike {T}: Target Dwarf creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Heart Wolf. Activate this ability only during combat.

item.name: Hungry Mist
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.
item.flavorText: "If the air must feed, let it take the self-righteous." —Murat, Death Speaker

item.name: Hungry Mist
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.
item.flavorText: "If the air must feed, let it take the self-righteous." —Murat, Death Speaker

item.name: Ihsan's Shade
item.text: Protection from white
item.flavorText: "Ihsan, the weak. Ihsan, the fallen. Ihsan, the betrayer. He has brought shame to the Serra Paladins where none existed before. May his suffering equal his betrayal." —Baris, Serra Inquisitor

item.name: Irini Sengir
item.text: White enchantment spells and green enchantment spells cost {2} more to cast.
item.flavorText: "That cruel being brings shame to all her fellow Dwarves and misery to all the land. She is Sengir's daughter in spirit if not in blood." —Reveka, Wizard Savant

item.name: Ironclaw Curse
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -0/-1. Enchanted creature can't block creatures with power equal to or greater than the enchanted creature's toughness.

item.name: Jinx
item.text: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "What wizards upset, the land soon rights." —Gemma, Willow Priestess

item.name: Joven
item.text: {R}{R}{R}, {T}: Destroy target noncreature artifact.
item.flavorText: "Joven, you're almost as good a thief as I. But Eron hates you even more." —Chandler

item.name: Joven's Ferrets
item.text: Whenever Joven's Ferrets attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn. At end of combat, tap all creatures that blocked Joven's Ferrets this turn. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

item.name: Joven's Tools
item.text: {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn except by Walls.
item.flavorText: "If that thief Joven ever shows his head around here again, make sure he leaves without it." —Eron the Relentless

item.name: Koskun Falls
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Koskun Falls unless you tap an untapped creature you control. Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.

item.name: Koskun Keep
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Treachery and anarchy make poor partners.

item.name: Labyrinth Minotaur
item.text: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
item.flavorText: "I doubt any Labyrinth Minotaurs still live—but then again, we Minotaurs are stubborn beings." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

item.name: Labyrinth Minotaur
item.text: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
item.flavorText: "I doubt any Labyrinth Minotaurs still live—but then again, we Minotaurs are stubborn beings." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

item.name: Leaping Lizard
item.text: {1}{G}: Leaping Lizard gains flying and gets -0/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I never question the Autumn Willow about her motives, not even when she turns people into Lizards. It's her way." —Devin, Faerie Noble

item.name: Leeches
item.text: Target player loses all poison counters. Leeches deals that much damage to that player.
item.flavorText: "Where our potions and powders fail, perhaps nature will succeed." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

item.name: Mammoth Harness
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses flying. Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, the other creature gains first strike until end of turn.

item.name: Marjhan
item.text: Marjhan doesn't untap during your untap step. Marjhan can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Marjhan. {U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Untap Marjhan. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. {U}{U}: Marjhan gets -1/-0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to target attacking creature without flying.

item.name: Memory Lapse
item.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Oh, I had a conscience once. But alas, I seem to have forgotten where I put it." —Chandler

item.name: Memory Lapse
item.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Oh, I had a conscience once. But alas, I seem to have forgotten where I put it." —Chandler

item.name: Merchant Scroll
item.text: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "There's no trade without trust." —Eron, the Relentless

item.name: Mesa Falcon
item.text: Flying {1}{W}: Mesa Falcon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The faith of Serra is borne on wings of hope." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

item.name: Mesa Falcon
item.text: Flying {1}{W}: Mesa Falcon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The faith of Serra is borne on wings of hope." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

item.name: Mystic Decree
item.text: All creatures lose flying and islandwalk.
item.flavorText: "Curse Reveka, and curse her coddled conjurers. Their sorcerers' school shall yet be ours." —Irini Sengir

item.name: Narwhal
item.text: First strike, protection from red
item.flavorText: "Who needs a spear? Ya break off the horn, and ya stab the fish with it. Easy" —Kakra, Sea Troll

item.name: Orcish Mine
item.text: Enchant land Orcish Mine enters the battlefield with three ore counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep and whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, remove an ore counter from Orcish Mine. If there are no ore counters on Orcish Mine, destroy that land and Orcish Mine deals 2 damage to its controller.

item.name: Primal Order
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Primal Order deals damage to that player equal to the number of nonbasic lands he or she controls.
item.flavorText: "It's strange, but I can feel it when the land is corrupted. I understand why the Autumn Willow is so protective." —Daria

item.name: Prophecy
item.text: Reveal the top card of target opponent's library. If it's a land, you gain 1 life. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Rashka the Slayer
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Rashka blocks one or more black creatures, Rashka gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Rarely be the prey so haughty as to hunt the hunter." —Baron Sengir

item.name: Reef Pirates
item.text: Whenever Reef Pirates deals damage to an opponent, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Corpses for crew don't sit well with me. Zeki and his dead ship had best keep their distance." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

item.name: Reef Pirates
item.text: Whenever Reef Pirates deals damage to an opponent, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Corpses for crew don't sit well with me. Zeki and his dead ship had best keep their distance." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

item.name: Renewal
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Renewal, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Retribution
item.text: Choose two target creatures an opponent controls. That player chooses and sacrifices one of those creatures. Put a -1/-1 counter on the other.

item.name: Reveka, Wizard Savant
item.text: {T}: Reveka, Wizard Savant deals 2 damage to target creature or player and doesn't untap during your next untap step.
item.flavorText: "It's nice to see a sister Dwarf in a position of such power, but why'd it have to be one of those seafaring muleheads?" —Halina, Dwarven Trader

item.name: Root Spider
item.text: Whenever Root Spider blocks, it gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "They're not half as fierce if they don't see you coming." —Devin, Faerie Noble

item.name: Roots
item.text: Enchant creature without flying When Roots enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
item.flavorText: "That which nourishes can also bind." —Gemma, Willow Priestess

item.name: Roterothopter
item.text: Flying {2}: Roterothopter gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
item.flavorText: "The Roterothoper is as insidious as it is ingenious. It is one of the few creations of our school that I take no pride in." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

item.name: Rysorian Badger
item.text: Whenever Rysorian Badger attacks and isn't blocked, you may exile up to two target creature cards from defending player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life for each card exiled this way and Rysorian Badger assigns no combat damage this turn.

item.name: Samite Alchemist
item.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control. Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
item.flavorText: "The wisest of Aysen dwell not in the Abbey, but in the laboratory." —Taysir

item.name: Samite Alchemist
item.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control. Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
item.flavorText: "The wisest of Aysen dwell not in the Abbey, but in the laboratory." —Taysir

item.name: Sea Sprite
item.text: Flying, protection from red
item.flavorText: "No one can catch what won't be caught." —Kakra, Sea Troll

item.name: Sea Troll
item.text: {U}: Regenerate Sea Troll. Activate this ability only if Sea Troll blocked or was blocked by a blue creature this turn.
item.flavorText: "I've seen those Trolls devour a drowning sailor faster than his lungs could fill with water." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

item.name: Sengir Autocrat
item.text: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens onto the battlefield. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.
item.flavorText: "A thankless job, and a death sentence besides." —Eron the Relentless

item.name: Sengir Bats
item.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Bats this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Bats.
item.flavorText: "They are the eyes of the Baron, and they know your fears." —Ihsan's Shade

item.name: Sengir Bats
item.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Bats this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Bats.
item.flavorText: "They are the eyes of the Baron, and they know your fears." —Ihsan's Shade

item.name: Serra Aviary
item.text: Creatures with flying get +1/+1.
item.flavorText: "Serra, like Feroz, is long since dead. But remember, Daria: her spirit shall survive so long as the Homelands do." —Taysir

item.name: Serra Bestiary
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Serra Bestiary unless you pay {W}{W}. Enchanted creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

item.name: Serra Inquisitors
item.text: Whenever Serra Inquisitors blocks or becomes blocked by one or more black creatures, Serra Inquisitors gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Serra Paladin
item.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Would that I could be a Paladin again, but the dead hold no place among their ranks." —Ihsan's Shade

item.name: Serrated Arrows
item.text: Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it. {T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

item.name: Shrink
item.text: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Do not fear adversity. Let your courage be your strength." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

item.name: Shrink
item.text: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Do not fear adversity. Let your courage be your strength." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

item.name: Soraya the Falconer
item.text: Bird creatures get +1/+1. {1}{W}: Target Bird creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "Soraya speaks with the hunters of the air, as do all of her family line." —Autumn Willow

item.name: Spectral Bears
item.text: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.
item.flavorText: "I hear there are Bears—or spirits—that guard caravans passing through the forest."Gulsen, Abbey Matron

item.name: Timmerian Fiends
item.text: Remove Timmerian Fiends from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {B}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Timmerian Fiends: The owner of target artifact may ante the top card of his or her library. If that player doesn't, exchange ownership of that artifact and Timmerian Fiends. Put the artifact card into your graveyard and Timmerian Fiends from anywhere into that player's graveyard. This change in ownership is permanent.

item.name: Torture
item.text: Enchant creature {1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "It helps you pass the time until you die." —Grandmother Sengir

item.name: Torture
item.text: Enchant creature {1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "It helps you pass the time until you die." —Grandmother Sengir

item.name: Trade Caravan
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a currency counter on Trade Caravan. Remove two currency counters from Trade Caravan: Untap target basic land. Activate this ability only during an opponent's upkeep.

item.name: Trade Caravan
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a currency counter on Trade Caravan. Remove two currency counters from Trade Caravan: Untap target basic land. Activate this ability only during an opponent's upkeep.

item.name: Truce
item.text: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.
item.flavorText: "The people of Aysen feed us, and we don't kill them. That's my kind of truce." —Eron the Relentless

item.name: Veldrane of Sengir
item.text: {1}{B}{B}: Veldrane of Sengir gets -3/-0 and gains forestwalk until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Poor, foolish Veldrane. He goes wherever the Baron wills him. One day, he'll go to die." —Halina, Dwarven Trader

item.name: Wall of Kelp
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {U}{U}, {T}: Put a 0/1 blue Plant Wall creature token with defender named Kelp onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Ya can eat it or ya can weave it, but ya can't fight in it." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

item.name: Willow Faerie
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "Swift as the wind and harder to catch— that's the Faeries for you." —Daria

item.name: Willow Faerie
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "Swift as the wind and harder to catch— that's the Faeries for you." —Daria

item.name: Willow Priestess
item.text: {T}: You may put a Faerie permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. {2}{G}: Target green creature gains protection from black until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Those of faith are those of strength." —Autumn Willow

item.name: Winter Sky
item.text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Winter Sky deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you lose the flip, each player draws a card.

item.name: Wizards' School
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The legacy of Feroz lives on.
